title.rendered: Lumiere Runway Presents Summer Night Fashion Show in Hollywood

content.rendered:
This June 25th 2022, Summer Night Lumiere Runway Fashion Show will bring 7 designers spanning nationwide to showcase more than 50 looks on the runway at BET Award weekend at a spectacular Hollywood Historical Mansion, 2027 N Highland Ave., CA 90068.

Lumiere Runway Fashion Show is one of the top fashion show in Los Angeles & Hong Kong. This year, Lumiere Runway will partner with Sovereign Art Foundation in Hong Kong on September 17th and expand to Dubai in October.

Lumiere Runway Fashion Show is an event with Fashion & Entertainment.

Singers, Sean Van Der Wilt | Shannon K | Inas X | Matthew Finley will be preforming on June 25th 2022.

Designers Line Up

- AF Fashion Club

- Karmic Apparel

- Rosalie Atelier

- JK Designs

- Attic Concept (Morphine Fashion & Gasanova)

Ticketing proceed will goes to Dress for Success Worldwide-West, a global not-for-profit organization that empowers women to achieve economic independence by providing a network of support, professional attire and the development tools to help women thrive in work and in life.

Partnerships

The show will be held in partnership with MUD Los Angeles, which supports Lumiere Runways showcase with their team of talented artists for hair and makeup.

Media partners are 24 Fashion TV, Malvie Magazine, H3R Magazine, Maximo TV, Fashion Fair Magazine, D Fashion Magazine, Exquisite Magazine, Moda Million, Style LA, Getty Images and more.

We create a unique show, where you can experience Paris and Milan fashion show with California's Greatest Entertainment!

Fashion Buyers, Celebrities, Fashion Businesses owners, Press/media are our Priority Audience. Ticket information: https://www.eventbrite.com/e/lumiere-runway-fashion-show-hollywood-hills-mansion-tickets-320978855397

Red carpet begins at 3pm for our VIP.

Show starts at 4:30pm

After party until 10pm with Open Bar/ Catering
